title: Ethereum transaction fee climbs above 219% - Cryptopolitan
content:
Over the recent three weeks, the realm of cryptocurrency transactions has witnessed a significant metamorphosis, particularly in the domains of Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH). Transaction costs for both these leading cryptocurrencies have experienced a noticeable surge, introducing a dynamic landscape for users partaking in digital asset transfers.

Ethereum transaction fees rise to $6.64

Bitcoin, as the pioneer in the cryptocurrency space, has encountered a sharp escalation in transaction costs, reaching a pinnacle of $15 per transfer just three days ago. This escalating trend in fees is not confined to Bitcoin alone; Ethereum has concurrently undergone a parallel trajectory. In the period spanning from October 22 to November 12, 2023, the average fee for Ethereum transactions soared by a striking 219%, elevating from $2.08 to $6.64 per transaction.

The synchronization in the movement of Ethereum’s fees with Bitcoin’s transaction costs can be attributed to the shared factor of gas expenses. The expenditure related to the gas required for executing transactions on both blockchains has seen an upswing during this timeframe. Currently, the average fee for an Ethereum transaction stands at $6.64, accompanied by a median fee of 0.0013 ETH, equivalent to $2.70 per transaction.

Interestingly, the alignment between Ethereum and Bitcoin becomes more apparent when comparing the average and median charges for transactions on both networks. However, a notable distinction emerges when engaging in specific operations on the Ethereum blockchain, such as interacting with a smart contract. Executing operations like exchanging an ETH-based asset on a decentralized exchange (dex) platform incurs a distinct fee ranging from $27.77 to $28.50 per transaction.

Complexities in ETH operations and transaction costs

Similarly, the cost associated with conducting a non-fungible token (NFT) transaction experiences fluctuations between $46.93 and $48.16. On November 12, the cost of transferring assets across different chains via bridging was estimated to be in the range of $8.93 to $9.17. This process accentuates the additional complexities and costs involved when moving assets across various blockchain networks. From October 22, 2023, to November 11, 2023, Ethereum has been processing an average of approximately 1,071,448 transactions daily.

This substantial transaction volume underscores the robust activity within the Ethereum network, despite the accompanying rise in transaction costs. In the broader comparison of Ethereum and Bitcoin, often referred to as the ‘Flippening Watch,’ Bitcoin maintains its lead over Ethereum in market capitalization, daily trading volume, and the fees collected by validators in the 24 hours compared to what BTC miners earn. Regardless of the chosen perspective, transactions on these two blockchains, which dominate in terms of market capitalization, come at a significantly higher cost compared to their other layer one (L1) counterparts.

As users navigate this evolving landscape of cryptocurrency transactions, the intricate interplay between fees, transaction volumes, and the distinctive characteristics of different blockchain operations becomes increasingly relevant. The surge in fees, while reflective of heightened activity and demand, prompts users to consider the cost-effectiveness of their chosen blockchain for specific operations and transactions in this ever-evolving digital financial ecosystem.

title: Raoul Pal Predicts Ethereum's Superior Performance Over Bitcoin in Crypto Market - CryptoGlobe
content:
Raoul Pal is a well-known figure in the finance and investment world, particularly recognized for his expertise in macroeconomic trends. He is the co-founder and CEO of Real Vision, a financial media company offering in-depth video interviews and research publications with some of the world’s best investors and economists.

Before establishing Real Vision, Pal had a successful career in the hedge fund industry. He retired from managing money at the age of 36 after a successful stint at Goldman Sachs where he co-managed the hedge fund sales business in Equities and Equity Derivatives in Europe. He also ran a successful global macro hedge fund.

Pal is known for his global macroeconomic perspectives, which he shares through various media channels, including Real Vision and social media platforms. His insights cover a broad range of topics, including global financial markets, commodities, cryptocurrencies, and economic trends. He is particularly noted for his analysis of the cryptocurrency market and has been a vocal proponent of digital assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum.

On November 9, addressing his one million followers on the social media platform X (formerly known as Twitter), Pal referenced the Tom Demark Sequential indicator to support his view that Ethereum is gearing up to surpass Bitcoin.

The Tom DeMark Sequential is a technical analysis indicator developed by Tom DeMark to identify potential price exhaustion and reversal points in financial markets. This tool is particularly popular among traders and analysts in various markets, including forex, stocks, and cryptocurrencies.

The Sequential consists of two main components: the Setup and the Countdown. Here’s a brief overview of how it works:

Setup: The Setup is the first phase and consists of nine consecutive candles. For a buy signal, each candle’s close must be lower than the close four candles earlier. Conversely, for a sell signal, each candle’s close must be higher than the close four candles earlier. Completing a Setup is the first indication of a potential trend reversal. Countdown: After the Setup is completed, the Countdown begins. This phase consists of 13 candles. For a buy Countdown, the low of each candle must be lower than the low two candles earlier. For a sell Countdown, the high of each candle must be higher than the high two candles earlier. The Countdown doesn’t need to be consecutive candles.

The Sequential indicator is often used to identify exhaustion points in a trend, suggesting that the current trend might be nearing its end and a reversal could be imminent. However, like all technical analysis tools, it’s not foolproof and is best used in conjunction with other indicators and methods to confirm signals.

Tom DeMark’s Sequential has gained a reputation for its effectiveness, especially in markets that exhibit strong trends, and is a favored tool among many professional traders for its ability to provide clear, actionable signals based on price action.

Pal highlighted a specific pattern, the weekly DeMark 9 count for the ETH/BTC cross, suggesting that Ethereum is likely to outperform Bitcoin in the current market phase.

That is the weekly DeMark 9 count for the ETH/BTC cross. ETH most likely outperforms from here as per usual at this stage in late Crypto Spring. pic.twitter.com/yBCrLRzFXn — Raoul Pal (@RaoulGMI) November 9, 2023

Furthermore, Pal discussed the significance of Ethereum-based exchange-traded funds (ETFs), which he considers the “holy grail” for asset managers. He explained that these ETFs allow managers to capture yield while providing only price performance to holders, making it a highly profitable venture until competitive alternatives emerge.

An ETH ETF is the holy grail for asset managers as they can capture the yield and only give price performance to the ETF holders. It is a super profitable business until it gets competed away eventually. — Raoul Pal (@RaoulGMI) November 9, 2023

Featured Image via Pixabay

title: What are the Rewards from the Top blockchain games on Ethereum? - Cryptopolitan
content:
Blockchain games have become one of the hottest topics in the gaming industry, and Ethereum is at the forefront of this trend. Ethereum-based games leverage blockchain technology to provide players with a secure environment for gaming, as well as exciting rewards and incentives. Here’s a list of some of the top blockchain games on Ethereum that you can play right now!

Illuvium

Take up the adventure of a lifetime with Illuvium, an open-world RPG built on the Ethereum Blockchain. Traverse a vast and varied land on your quest to capture deity-like creatures called Illuvials – battle, upgrade, and make teams for triumph in the competition.

With over one hundred Illuvials, each possessing different affinities, classes, and abilities, there are endless combinations for crafting an unbeatable team. Capture them all, – then store them in Shards! These sleek crystal slivers hold the creature’s essence, so you can compare stats and brag about your rare collectibles. Then, join us in our community-based governance to earn $ILV through play and become one of our champions!

Guild of Guardians

Guild Of Guardians will appeal to passionate gamers looking to bring their love of gaming into a new, stratified arena.

Players will become team Leaders in this multiplayer fantasy action RPG and assemble their dream team of ‘Guardians,’ which they can deploy against enemy forces and climb the ranks of their guild for epic rewards. Developed and published by Stepico Games and Immutable, respectively – these are two industry-leading companies that have made massive contributions to the gaming world. Stepico has created multiple titles with over 5 million downloads. Immutable has earned $17m in funding investments from notable sources such as Naspers, Galaxy Digital, and Coinbase, having also launched Gods Unchained, one of the most popular Blockchain Trading Card Games.

With such an established legacy under both companies’ belts, Guild Of Guardians promises an exciting new experience for gamers of all levels.

CryptoKitties

CryptoKitties is a virtual pet game built on Ethereum and one of the first to capture the public’s imagination. Players can purchase, breed, trade, and collect their favorite digital cats, each with unique traits.

CryptoKitties have become incredibly popular due to their low barrier of entry – the game is accessible and intuitive for even those with no prior blockchain or gaming experience. With millions of kitties in circulation, CryptoKitties has become one of the most popular blockchain games and continues to grow each day as new players join.

The Sandbox

The Sandbox is a unique gaming platform where players can create, own and monetize their game experiences. Through this innovative play-to-earn model, players can earn SAND tokens by playing games or creating content within the world, which they can use to buy or sell items in The Sandbox’s virtual marketplace.

Players can choose from various pre-made worlds and use their imagination to construct environments, create characters, and design adventures for other players. The Sandbox is revolutionary as it enables players to take ownership of their in-game assets, building a digital world and incentivizing users to stay and play.

Axie Infinity

Axie Infinity is a digital pet universe built on Ethereum and based in the fantasy world of ‘Lunia.’ In this game, players can collect and battle their favorite Axies. These adorable creatures have unique stats which can be improved through battles, creating a competitive and strategic online arena for Axie enthusiasts.

Axie Infinity has seen tremendous success in the blockchain space, with its token AXS reaching an all-time high in November 2021 and its player count over 500k. It has also won prestigious awards, and numerous publications, such as Forbes, have featured it. Crypto gaming fans should check out this game and join its passionate community.

Axie Infinity is an innovative and creative concept pushing the boundaries of blockchain gaming to create something truly unique. Players can explore Lunia’s vibrant world with their Axies, earn rewards through play, and participate in its ever-growing community. Join the fun today!

Decentraland

Decentraland is a virtual world powered by the Ethereum blockchain, where users can create and explore 3D experiences. Players can purchase land parcels (called LAND) which they can use to build their virtual creations, from games, shops, and galleries to art installations, music venues, and more.

Decentraland’s cryptocurrency MANA is used for buying and selling goods in the virtual world and for staking purposes, allowing players to earn rewards through play. Decentraland’s popularity has steadily grown since its launch in 2017, and it now boasts over 1 million users worldwide.

Decentraland provides an exciting opportunity for gamers and artists to express themselves in a virtual world and make real money from their creations. It’s a unique concept that will grow and evolve as more players join its vibrant community.

My Neighbour Alice

My Neighbor Alice is an exciting virtual world experience fusing two popular gaming genres: collecting and building. Developer Antler Interactive has created a unique environment for players to customize their virtual island, craft items, build structures and make new friends. Starting with the classic elements of successful builder games, like Animal Crossing, it also includes a blockchain-powered digital asset economy that rewards loyal players with Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), which they can collect and trade. With high-quality 3D graphics and a one-of-a-kind storyline, My Neighbor Alice offers every player something more special than just another multiplayer game.

League of Kingdoms

League of Kingdoms provides players with an innovative, intuitive, unique, and incomparable gaming experience.

This free-to-play MMO war strategy game runs on a blockchain, and the battles occur in fully immersive 3D worlds. At its core, League of Kingdoms is an RTS tasked with players developing their kingdoms, assembling an army, forming alliances, and conquering lands.

Players can even purchase virtual land as non-fungible tokens (NFT). Moreover, with no prior experience or knowledge of cryptocurrencies needed to play this game, anyone can join in on the fun while potentially earning real rewards!

If you want to mix traditional gaming tactics with blockchain technology, League of Kingdoms delivers a genuinely unbeatable and revolutionary experience!

Gods Unchained

Gods Unchained has shaken the card gaming world with an innovative model that allows players to own their digital cards.

The studio behind this game wanted to break away from the traditional model of having your collection reset when rotation hits. Instead, players have complete control over their assets and can take them between any title that accepts NFTs.

There are four unique modes for users to explore, giving them various ways to enjoy Gods Unchained. First, the tutorial guides you through the basics and more advanced strategies before diving into the Solo mode, which pits you against computer-controlled opponents. Finally, direct Challenges and Ranked let you compete against others, allowing you to show off your skills for a chance at glory! Explore Gods Unchained with these exciting modes today!

Aavegotchi

Aavegotchi is a compelling and unique NFT gaming experience that lets you purchase and raise Aavegotchis in an explorable digital universe. After obtaining the GHST tokens, players can participate in the game by buying various items from the marketplace or using a portal to summon an Aavegotchi. This unique avatar has attributes defined by rarity score, so all Gotchis are unique! You can level up your Gotchi by petting it every 12 hours or feeding it one of many consumables to interact with it. Players who “farm” their Aavegotchi will be rewarded with incentives such as wearables for their avatar, making Aavegotchi an addictive and engaging game!

DeRace

DeRace is an innovative horse racing simulator that offers players a highly realistic and immersive experience. This dynamic platform allows users to take on the role of a bookmaker, gambler, or horse owner to create their ultimate horse racing game.

From managing betting odds to becoming the top-dog horse breeder, DeRace provides players with various exciting activities and responsibilities. As they navigate the different aspects of the industry, they will get challenged while earning tangible profits determined by the success of their performance.

Make sure you jump on the DeRace bandwagon, as it will provide thrilling entertainment for anyone looking for a realistic horseracing experience!

Conclusion

These NFT games are sure to keep players entertained for hours on end. With so many creative and captivating titles, there is something for everyone! From competitive card battles to virtual pet raising, explore these innovative gaming experiences today. Experience a new world of gaming with blockchain technology as you own your digital assets and reap the rewards!

title: Weekly Highlights: Bitcoin & Ethereum Hold Strong, Altcoins Shines - TronWeekly
content:

In the top 50 cryptocurrencies list, several altcoins made impressive gains, and the standout performer was THORChain (RUNE). Solana (SOL) and Avalanche (AVAX) followed closely behind, securing the second and third positions, respectively, with impressive growth.

Source: CoinMarketcap

THORChain (RUNE) made a significant mark with a remarkable 53% surge over the past week, reaching a peak of $5.83. As of the latest data, it is trading at $5.22, demonstrating robust performance despite experiencing a slight 1.80% increase in the last 24 hours.

Source: CoinMarketcap

Solana (SOL) also made waves with a 44% gain during the past week. SOL is currently trading at $58.4, with a marginal 0.86% decrease in price and a 47.49% decrease in trading volume in the last 24 hours.

Source: CoinMarketcap

Avalanche (AVAX) garnered significant attention, with a weekly increase of more than 39%. Currently, AVAX is trading at $18.08, with a 1% price decrease and a 26.63% drop in trading volume within the last 24 hours.

Other popular altcoins such as Polygon (MATIC), Chainlink (LINK), and Cosmos (ATOM) also reported gains in their weekly charts, with MATIC up by 24%, LINK by 22%, and ATOM showing an 18% increase, according to data from CoinMarketCap.

Source: CoinMarketcap

Source: CoinMarketcap
